shortdesc.ph: Detailed information of a music resource.
Detailed information about the music resource.

plentry.pd: The identifier of the music resource.
The name of the music resource.
The name of the singer.
The download URL of the music poster.
The release time of the music resource.

The type of music resource:
1: Single-track source with accompaniment on the left channel and original vocals on the right channel.
2: Single-track source with accompaniment only.
3: Single-track source with original vocals only.
4: Multi-track source.

Whether the song supports singing score:
1: The song supports singing score.
2: The song does not support singing score.
Total duration of the music resource (in seconds).

Supported lyric formats:
0: XML format.
1: LRC format.
List of climax segments. See .
The number of lyrics in the song.
The number of climax segments.
The ID of the music resource, used to identify a music resource.

Release time of the music resource.

Type of music resource:
1: Mono track audio with accompaniment on the left channel and original vocals on the right channel.
2: Mono track audio with accompaniment only.
3: Mono track audio with original vocals only.
4: Multi-track audio.

Whether the song supports singing scoring:
1: The song supports singing scoring.
2: The song does not support singing scoring.
Total duration of the music resource (in seconds).

Supported lyric formats:
0: XML format.
1: LRC format.
List of music climax segments. See .
Number of lyrics for the song.
Number of climax segments.
